text: Goodmorning, would anyone have some experience translating webpages and landing pages to various languages? Is it possible to export and import translation files, or is this a manual exercise in the editor?

HubSpot has a multi-language tool built-in, so you can create multi-language variants for your content.

There are certain text elements that may be hardcoded depending on what templates/theme you are using.

Here is the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/create-pages-in-multiple-languages?__hstc=128690771.b690de5b8ff2704202032989ceaf797f.1662666004280.1665400787151.1665404146439.101&__hssc=128690771.2.1665404146439&__hsfp=428098088|link to the HS documentation for creating multi-language pages>

I'm not sure if it would be helpful, but here is the <https://www.maka-agency.com/documentation/multi-language-website-pages-in-HubSpot|documentation for POWER theme> showing how we've handled multi-langauge translations.
Last time I had to do it, it was completely manual; it might be different now ( I don't think so )
